lines.text: ...then Mr. GQ here makes a special guest appearance from New York!
You ever consider a career in southern law enforcement?

[meets Elvis the alligator]
Hey get him away from me man! I don't even like alligator shoes!

[after discussing Sonny's college football successes, Tubbs asked why wasn't he in the pros]
Some Southeast Asian conference.
You're all players, Sonny. You get high on the action.
Tubbs, you ever think about a career in southern law enforcement?
